get_data1.p1: Itri.living is a hospitality services company (under incorporation) dedicated to providing unbeatable value and authentic travel experiences in exotic places.
get_data1.p2: With a mission to offer a minimum 50% price discount compared to similar options, Itri.living focuses on delivering exceptional value without compromising on quality.
get_data1.p3: Through long-term partnerships with property developers at the very early stages, we offer tailor-made, bespoke hospitality resorts that align with our core values of authenticity, well-being, and exceptional value for money. We have secured a partnership with a Mediterranean developer to develop for our brand, by summer 2030, four exclusive resorts, the 1st one set to open mid-2027.
get_data1.p4: Itri.living will also curate select existing accommodations, offering similar value to our community while we await the launch of our custom-built destinations.
get_data1.title: Itri Living

get_data2.p1: At Itri.Living, accommodations rights to our resorts portfolio are tokenized (under Swiss juridiction contracts) and represented as ERC-21 Tokens.
get_data2.p10: This vision maximizes transaction volume for the Itri Token
get_data2.p13: When Itri Tokens change wallets, a fee is paid - This is the basis of our income model: we make money when you make money!
get_data2.p15: When Itri tokens are used to book a stay in one of our Resorts, no trading fees are paid, and you enjoy the exceptional value for money you deserve. Our booking solution NiteBook (under development) will take you through an effortless and intuitive booking journey.
get_data2.p19: These are what we know are valuable experiences for our community.
get_data2.p3: Itri tokens have the following utility/characteristics:
get_data2.p5: Itri Tokens will be traded (bought & sold)
get_data2.p6: on a selected Exchange(s) (centralized and/or DeFi). Our Marketplace of choice will be the TURA Marketplace (a partyner project, addressing specifically digital assets with real world benefits)
get_data2.p8: One itri token equals one accommodation night, at any Itri Resort -
get_data2.p9: In the future, we may include a limited number of ultra luxury resorts, marketed under the Itri Luxury brand, and may require two Itri tokens for one accommodation night
get_data2.title: Tokenised Accommodation Rights:

get_data3.b1: Benefits to be found in all our
get_data3.b5: State-of-the-art facilities and services on site including pools, fitness amenities, a wellness center, and more.

get_data4.c10: At Itri.living, our income model is not solely based on accommodation services we offer. Our income comes also from the fees we earn when you trade Itri tokens on Exchanges.
get_data4.c11: So when you make money, we make money with you.
get_data4.c4: At Itri.living, we are able to offer exceptional value for money to our community through a combination of the following:
get_data4.c5: I - By partnering with property developers that already secured the property resort land early-on, at reasonable prices.
get_data4.c6: II - By engaging our Capital and financial resources to purchase accommodation rights at bulk prices, we are able to secure the best prices for the resort accommodation units.
get_data4.c7: III - Having chosen a fully digital community driven model, we are able to save on marketing and client acquisition costs.
get_data4.c8: For the above reasons, engaging our capital and balance sheet, partnering with custom-made resorts and choosing a fully digital model allow us to limit our costs and pass-on the savings on to our Community.
get_data4.c9: IV - However, the most important factor is our strategy to make money only when you make money, thereby aligning our interests with yours, in a win-win philosophy.

get_data5.d3: Each stay is more than a simple escape—it’s an opportunity to connect with nature, immerse yourself in local culture, and create lasting memories that embody the true essence of travel.
get_data5.d4: At Itri Living, your journey is illuminated by ‘Itri’ the star that represents our dedication to authentic and meaningful experiences.

get_data6.e2: Please note that, at this stage, we currently do not have any Capacity Purchase Agreements  in place, with operational RESORTS.
get_data6.e3: However, WE HAVE PARTNERED WITH A DEVELOPER TO START construction IN AN AMAZING BEACH-FRONT LOCATION:
get_data6.e4: Itri Residences Nador, situated on the Mediterranean Sea. THREE OTHER beachfront projects, on the Mediterranean Sea and Atlantic Ocean, are under consideration with an objective to be operational BY SUMMER 2030.
get_data6.e5: Our Product Development team is also busy identifying existing Resorts that align with our values, so we can negociate bulk capacity purchase agreement
get_data6.e6: While we aim to develop a diverse catalog of properties for Itri COMMUNITY, there is no guarantee that the tailor-made projects will be built IN-TIME, or that they will be in the specific location mentioned.
get_data6.e7: However, we are committed to making every effort to offer a rich selection of

get_data7.f1: Exclusive Benefits for Itri NFT Holders
get_data7.f12: Each Itri NFT holder will have the opportunity to purchase up to 30 accommodation days every year, at Itri resorts, at a significant discount to market price (up to 80% off the market value).
get_data7.f14: We will make every effort to introduce four new first tailor-made resort developed by our partner asset developer to our specific standards, by summer 2030
get_data7.f16: By the summer 2026 holiday season, we will conclude our 1st Bulk Capacity Pruschase Agreement, and introduce our initial Resorts to our Community. These will always feature to the Itri NFT Club members, a min 50% discount off the market value.
get_data7.f3: Itri.living has entered into a strategic Agreement with Tura NFTs Marketplace project. This partnership offers to Itri NFT holders the following benefits:
get_data7.f4: I - As discussed, each ITRI NFT holder/digital club member already has the ability to purchase 30 ITRI tokens (issued by Itri.living) per year at a special cost of 35 Sfr/token (a garanteed 40% discount to the official token price, and a 50% to 80% discount to market value). This means that ITRI NFT holders will benefit from 30 days every year in any of our exclusive resorts at a cost of 35 Sfr/day. Of course, they can also trade their Itri tokens (or NFT) at the TURA Marketplace.
get_data7.f5: II - On top of this, each ITRI NFT holder/digital club member will receive TURA governance tokens, to encourage the Itri community to support the TURA Project DAO, and trade their Itri NFTs/ Tokens
get_data7.f8: to Itri NFT Digital Club Members:
get_data7.f9: We are dedicated to ensuring that your Itri Living NFT ownership brings you exceptional value and exclusive opportunities.

dataFaq.question: What is Itri.Living?
dataFaq.answer: Itri Living is a Swiss hospitality services company (under incorporation) dedicated to providing unbeatable value and authentic travel experiences in exotic locations. By leveraging blockchain technology, and partnering with hospitality asset developers early on, we create bespoke resorts that reflect our values of well-being, authenticity, and great value for money.

dataFaq.question: How does Itri Living work?
dataFaq.answer: Itri Living offers tokenized accomodation rights on carefuling selected resorts. Members can book stays at our curated resorts using tokens and enjoy exclusive benefits and discounts with each reservation.

dataFaq.question: What makes Itri Living unique?
dataFaq.answer: Our technology changes everything : it gives our members simplicity, transparency and liquidity.. One dedicated resorts will be designed to be environmentally friendly, combining eco-responsible architecture with local traditions. We offer immersive experiences focused on sustainability and authenticity, all at unbeatable prices.

dataFaq.question: What types of experiences does Itri Living offer?
dataFaq.answer: We offer a range of experiences: relaxation in spas, water sports, hiking, yoga, and cultural immersion, all with a strong focus on ecological and community engagement.

dataFaq.question: Where are Itri Living resorts located?
dataFaq.answer: Our first resorts will focus on beachfront locations in the Mediterranean sea. Discussions are ongoing for locations.

dataFaq.question: Who are the partners of Itri Living?
dataFaq.answer: We will partner with both innovative web3 projects as well as etablished hospitality services companies, to bring value to our Community. Our partnership agreement with TURA NFTs Marketplace is a perfect exemple of this synergy

dataFaq.question: How can I take advantage of the exclusive offers and discounts?
dataFaq.answer: We will start offering Itri tokens to our Community, once we have purshased and tokenised Accomodation rights

dataFaqHeader.description: If our Membership FAQs are not enough, feel free to book a call with us and we’ll be happy to assist you!
